SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NON - 8th SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
(a) British Front. Except on the sector between HAVRINCOURT and the SOMME there is no material change.
In this sector further progress has been made and the general line reached is :- West of HAVRINCOURT, eastern edge of HAVRINCOURT WOOD, west of GOUZEAUCOURT WOOD, HEUDICOURT, GUYENCOURT, SAULCOURT, ST.EMILLIE, (north-east of VILLIERS-FAUCON), ROISEL, BERNES, FLECHIN, east of POEUILLY, VILLEVEQUE, east of BEAUVOIS.
(b) French Front. From the north of the SOMME to south of the OISE the enemy retirement continues and the French are now on the following line :- VAUX, FULQUIERES, HAPPENCOURT, east of the PONT DE TUGNY and ST. SIMON, AVESNE, JUSSY, railway line to TERGNIER, AMIGNY-ROUY, BARISIS.
The French have also taken CELLES-SUR-AISNE.
2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
8th September, 1918.
Issued at 12.30 p.m.
